backendUrlMissing.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Critical Error: BACKEND_URL not replaced during build
backendUrlMissing.subtitle: Placeholder __BACKEND_URL_PLACEHOLDER__ detected, URL not replaced
backendUrlMissing.description: Placeholder found in pixel extension config, indicating build process failure. If not replaced, pixel extension cannot send events to backend, causing data loss. This is a critical configuration error must be fixed before launch.
backendUrlMissing.fixStepsTitle: Fix Steps (Must complete before production deployment):
backendUrlMissing.step1: Run pnpm ext:inject or pnpm deploy:ext before deployment in CI/CD
backendUrlMissing.step2: Ensure SHOPIFY_APP_URL environment variable is set correctly
backendUrlMissing.step3: Verify extension build artifacts do not contain placeholders
backendUrlMissing.step4: Ensure this URL is configured in Web Pixel Extension allowlist
backendUrlMissing.step5: Do not use shopify app deploy directly, must use pnpm deploy:ext
